full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SA BRGYAD DBANG PHYUG RNAM MANG THOS SRAS MDUD DMAR CAN LHA'I DGE BSNYEN GYI TSUL BZUNG BA CHOS SKYONG CHEN PO TSANGS PA DUNG THOD CAN GYI GSOL MCHOD 'DOD PA'I RE SKONG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,(CES SA BRGYAD DBANG PHYUG RNAM MANG THOS SRAS MDUD DMAR CAN LHA'I DGE BSNYEN GYI TSUL BZUNG BA CHOS SKYONG CHEN PO TSANGS PA DUNG THOD CAN GYI GSOL MCHOD 'DOD PA'I RE SKONG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DGE LDAN DGE RGYAS GLING GI DGE BSGOS CHEN PO SDOM BRTZON BLO BZANG BSTAN PAS TSOGS 'DON DU 'DUGS GYU 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES NAN TAN CHEN POS BSKUL BA'I NGOR RGYAL BA YAB SRAS KYI GSUR RGYUN LA BRTEN NAS DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS KYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI CHOS LA BLO MIG RGYAS PA LHA BRIS PA NGAG DBANG BZANG PO'O, ,)
